org.dancres.blitz.jini.lockmgr

Class DistributedLockManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dancres.blitz.jini.lockmgr.DistributedLockManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LockManager, org.jgroups.blocks.TwoPhaseVotingListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener

    public class DistributedLockManager
extends Object
implements org.jgroups.blocks.TwoPhaseVotingListener, LockManager, org.jgroups.MessageListener
    Distributed lock manager is responsible for maintaining the lock information consistent on all participating nodes.

    A modified version of the original which provides support for leased locks, the holding of a resource against a given lock and state replication.

    Author:
    Roman Rokytskyy (rrokytskyy@acm.org), Dan Creswell (dan@dancres.org)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DistributedLockManager.AcquireLockDecree
      This class represents the lock to be released.
      static class  DistributedLockManager.DeleteDecree 
      static class  DistributedLockManager.LockDecree
      This class represents the lock
      static class  DistributedLockManager.NewDecree 
      static class  DistributedLockManager.ReleaseLockDecree
      This class represents the lock to be released.
      static class  DistributedLockManager.TransactionalOwner
      This class simply allows us to make the transaction part of the requester id which makes sense as the lock is owned by the transaction as much as the requester.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DistributedLockManager

        public DistributedLockManager(VotingAdapter voteChannel,
                      Object id)
        Create instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        voteChannel - instance of VotingAdapter that will be used for voting purposes on the lock decrees. voteChannel() will be wrapped by the instance of the TwoPhaseVotingAdapter.
        id - the unique identifier of this lock manager.

      • getResource

        Specified by:

      • lock

        public void lock(Object lockId,
        Object owner,
        long timeout,
        Transaction aTxn)
          throws org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotGrantedException,
                 org.jgroups.ChannelException
        Locks an object with lockId on behalf of the specified owner.
        Specified by:
        lock in interface LockManager
        Parameters:
        lockId - Object representing the object to be locked.
        owner - object that requests the lock.
        timeout - time during which group members should decide whether to grant a lock or not.
        aTxn - the transaction to acquire the lock under
        Throws:
        org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotGrantedException - when the lock cannot be granted.
        IllegalArgumentException - if lockId or owner are not serializable.
        org.jgroups.ChannelException - if something bad happened to underlying channel.

      • insert

        public void insert(Object lockId,
          long aTimeout,
          Serializable aResource)
            throws org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotGrantedException,
                   org.jgroups.ChannelException
        Description copied from interface: LockManager

        Store a resource against a particular lock id for later recovery via getResource.

        Note insert will fail if a lock is currently held or is about to be asserted against that id.

        Specified by:
        insert in interface LockManager
        Throws:
        org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotGrantedException
        org.jgroups.ChannelException

      • delete

        public void delete(Object lockId,
          long aTimeout)
            throws org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotReleasedException,
                   org.jgroups.ChannelException
        Description copied from interface: LockManager

        Delete a resource held against a particular lock id.

        This operation will fail whilst a lock is actively held against the lock id.

        Specified by:
        delete in interface LockManager
        Throws:
        org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotReleasedException
        org.jgroups.ChannelException

      • unlock

        public void unlock(Object lockId,
          Object owner,
          Transaction aTxn)
            throws org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotReleasedException,
                   org.jgroups.ChannelException
        Unlocks an object with lockId on behalf of the specified owner.
        Specified by:
        unlock in interface LockManager
        Parameters:
        lockId - long representing the object to be unlocked.
        owner - object that releases the lock.
        Throws:
        org.jgroups.blocks.LockNotReleasedException - when the lock cannot be released.
        IllegalArgumentException - if lockId or owner are not serializable.
        org.jgroups.ChannelException - if something bad happened to communication channel.

      • prepare

        public boolean prepare(Object decree)
                throws org.jgroups.blocks.VoteException
        Prepare phase for the lock acquisition or release.
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface org.jgroups.blocks.TwoPhaseVotingListener
        Parameters:
        decree - should be an instance LockDecree, if not, we throw VoteException to be ignored by the VoteChannel.
        Returns:
        true when preparing the lock operation succeeds.
        Throws:
        org.jgroups.blocks.VoteException - if we should be ignored during voting.
